mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, n.* from (select member_no as memberNo, member_id as memberId, member_pw as memberPw, member_name as memberName, member_email as memberEmail, member_phone as memberPhone, enroll_date as enrollDate, member_nickname as memberNickname from member order by member_no desc)n) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) as cnt from member

select member_no as memberNo, member_id as memberId, member_pw as memberPw, member_name as memberName, member_email as memberEmail, member_phone as memberPhone, enroll_date as enrollDate, member_nickname as memberNickname from member where member_id=#{memberId} and member_pw = #{memberPw}
